system.description:
Those who see their training as a higher calling will fight with their chosen weapon like a whirlwind.

On every odd level, due to their special combat experience, they receive +2 to the damage of a selected weapon type (e.g. swords, polearms, bludgeoning weapons, etc.).  Selected twice, the bonus increases to +3, or they receive +1 to hit; selected three times, they receive both benefits.
